1

Drip 2 1 - 3

Inflicts Water damage. When cast on an ally, applies a Water shield that reduces the next enemy hindering received.

Normal effects

Damage: 2
Water Shield
When affected by a spell taking away AP or MP:
- The amount removed is reduced by 3
- The Feca gains 2 AP (1 turn)
Empty cell: River Glyph (Level 1)

Critical effects

Damage: 2
Water Shield
When affected by a spell taking away AP or MP:
- The amount removed is reduced by 3
- The Feca gains 2 AP (1 turn)
Empty cell: River Glyph (Level 1)
